0.name: A dark crack in the wall
desc: All about you is darkness, you here only the sound water dripping from the
ceiling above. You have dark forboding, like your being watched from somewhere
but regardless of where you look you can see anybody about. This chamber is
small and disgustingly dirty, now sign of life can be seen anywhere.

1.name: The Assassins Abode
1.desc: If you're trapped here, contact Fionn.

2.name: Guild Stoage chamber
desc: All about this room a various chests that the assassins use to store guild
equip and necessary supplies, to complete and accomplish thier dark and deadly

3.name: Assassin training grounds
desc: This is where the deadly walkers on the night, train and learn the various
and deadly skills that they require to accomplish thier dark work. All about
you can se numerous assassins being trained in various skills by the guild

4.name: The Portal chamber
desc: All about your ar numerous glowing portals that were created by powerful mages
at great cost, this chamber allows you entrance to many places at a mere step
to allow easy access to your prey.
